testcase.name: Take notes of a page of a document
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Take notes of a page of a document Given I am reading a document about "Lean Software Development" ... passed in 0.002s When I add a note with the text "Tomar en cuenta estos principios" in the page 10 ... passed in 0.001s Then I should see the note in the notes section ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
